name: Easy Roller - RPG Dice Roller
description:
Perfect for Dungeons and Dragons!
Save your dice roll history and favorites with your Google account. Your email is required for us to pair your roll data with your email, using Google's Firebase service. WE WILL NOT USE YOUR GOOGLE ACCOUNT FOR ANYTHING OTHER THAN SAVING ROLL DATA.
Access your roll history and favorites from multiple Android devices.

Features:
* Simple dice roll interface, even for complex rolls
* History tab logs your previous rolls
* Favorite previous rolls to re-roll anytime
* Google Sign-in (required to save History and Favorites)
* Rolls saved to cloud, access them from any device after signing into your Google account
* Portrait and Landscape
